title: 关于生命附魔生成率
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2918979170 于 2020-3-25 09:23 编辑 

求助大佬生命附魔配置文件怎么调生成率，战利品钓鱼全是生命附魔
补上
# Configuration file

general {

    general {
        # Changes whether Living is incompatible with vanilla damage/efficiency enchantments, like sharpness. Protection is also incompatible with living, for armor.
        B:"Allow Damage/Efficiency Enchantments"=false

        # Whether or not you can enchant armor with Living.
        B:"Allow Living Armor"=true

        # Changes how much damage reduction you gain per level. Because of math, no matter what number you pick, you'll never exceed 100% damage reduction, ever.
        # Min: 0.0
        # Max: 10.0
        D:"Armor Effectiveness Per Level"=0.05

        # If true, and not Mending-Style XP Handling, additional block break XP will scale with block hardness.
        # If false and not Vanilla XP style, block break XP will always be 1 * blockXPMultiplier
        B:"Dynamic Block XP"=true

        # If true and not Mending-Style XP Handling, additional kill XP will scale with Mob HP.
        # If false and not Vanilla XP style, kill XP will always be 1 * killXPMultiplier
        B:"Dynamic Kill XP"=true

        # Changes how much effectiveness the enchanted item gains per level. 0.05 (5%) is the default.
        # Min: 0.0
        # Max: 10.0
        D:"Effectiveness Per Level"=0.05

        # Changes how much XP is required for each level. 0.05 is the minPersonality, and would be very fast leveling. 100 is the maxPersonality, and would take forever to level.
        # Min: 0.05
        # Max: 100.0
        D:"Level XP Modifier (Larger is Slower)"=1.0

        # Sets the max level cap.
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 999999
        I:"Max Level"=999999

        # Changes the minimum delay between (in Milliseconds) times the item will talk
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 900000
        I:"Minimum Dialogue Delay (MS)"=15000

        # Changes whether or not living items will talk to you. On by default.
        B:"Show Dialogue"=true

        # Changes whether personalities show up in tooltip.
        B:"Show Personality"=true

        # Determines How XP is Gained. 
        # 0 - Mending-Style: Living works like mending, absorbing XP Orbs
        # 1 - Original: Gain XP on breaking blocks with tools or killing mobs, 
        # 2 - Original with Orbs: Like original, but breaking blocks/killing drops XP orbs just for living enchantments.
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 2
        I:"XP Handling Style"=2

        # Changes how much XP block break gives.
        # Min: 0.0
        # Max: 100.0
        D:"XP Per Block Multiplier"=1.0

        # Changes how much XP each kill gives.
        # Min: 0.0
        # Max: 300.0
        D:"XP Per Kill Multiplier"=3.0

        # Determines whether or not living items will share gained XP (or if it will all just go to one)
        B:"XP Share"=false

        # Changes how loud the XP added by this mod is.
        # Min: 0.0
        # Max: 200.0
        D:"XP Volume"=0.15
    }

    loot {
        # Changes whether spawned chests (dungeons, blacksmith, etc) can spawn living enchantment loot.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        B:"Chest Loot"=true

        # Changes chance of getting living enchantment loot from chests, 1 in [value]. Default is 1 in 3.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1
        # Max: 10000
        I:"Chest Loot Chance"=3

        # Changes what type of loot can spawn in chests. 0 - Just random unique items, 1 - Uniques and enchanted books, 2 - Just enchanted books.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 2
        I:"Chest Loot Type"=1

        # Changes whether fishing rewards living enchantment loot.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        B:"Fishing Loot"=true

        # Changes chance of getting living enchantment loot from fishing, 1 in [value]. Default is 1 in 40.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1
        # Max: 10000
        I:"Fishing Loot Chance"=40

        # Changes what type of loot is rewarded when fishing. 0 - Just random unique items, 1 - Uniques and enchanted books, 2 - Just enchanted books.
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 0
        # Max: 2
        I:"Fishing Loot Type"=1
    }

    personalities {
        # Changes how common the "Alien" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        D:"Alien Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Cat" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        D:"Cat Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Demonic" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Demonic Weight"=2.0

        # Changes how common the "Depressed" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Depressed Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Dog" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        D:"Dog Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Glitchy" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        D:"Glitchy Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Lazy" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Lazy Weight"=2.0

        # Changes how common the "Lewd" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Lewd Weight"=1.0

        # Changes how common the "Live Wire" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Live Wire Weight"=2.0

        # Changes how common the "Silent" personality is.
        #  Weight is relative to all other personality weights (odds are this weight / total weight).
        # Requires minecraft restart to take affect.
        # Min: 1.0
        # Max: 1000.0
        D:"Silent Weight"=2.0
    }

}
